title: Bug 14197 - Removing a working set immediately applies changes
description: When a working set is removed, the changes are immediately applied instead of waiting for user confirmation.
OB: Upon removing a working set, the package view is immediately filtered and the changes take effect without asking for user confirmation.
EB: Upon removing a working set, the package view should not be filtered immediately. Instead, changes should only take effect after user confirmation.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. Observe that the package view is filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again and create a second working set. Delete the first working set. The package view should not be immediately filtered after deletion.
